scripts.install: eval 'if [ -f ".travis.yml" ]; then test/bin/install.sh; else bin/install.sh; fi'
scripts.pretest: eval 'if [ -f ".travis.yml" ]; then test/bin/pretest.sh; else bin/pretest.sh; fi'
scripts.test: eval 'if [ -f ".travis.yml" ]; then test/bin/test.sh; else bin/test.sh; fi'
scripts.posttest: eval 'if [ -f ".travis.yml" ]; then protractor test/e2e/protractor.config.js; else protractor ./e2e/protractor.config.js; fi'
scripts.coverage: eval 'if [ -f ".travis.yml" ]; then test/bin/coverage.sh; else bin/coverage.sh; fi'
scripts.build: npm run build:styles && npm run build:modules
